> [testingzeronet12](#comment_9_1CMjV2r4EBpFt8VCcWWZKDysZXPcPExRNN): I'm making a decentralized peer 2 Peer video streaming portal like Youtube on ZeroNet, using WebTorrent streaming technology, which means the videos cannot be deleted. This is my proof of concept. Can anyone help with integrating webtorrent into the html?: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AtRr9BPxKkPswG4uKn17bht2JCdv2cMqt/

Could be existing bitcoin blockchain or similar.

> [bot](#comment_53_1KdnTJVBGzEZrJppFZtzfG9chukuMv8xSb): Yes, but bitcoin blockchain is huge (growing) so parsing is slow.This project on github looks suitable for the task..   https://github.com/ssbc/secure-scuttlebutt/(..I've made start on a db-editor, and ready to try adding this functionality myself also)
